fields.label: Tasks completed
fields.name: tasksCompleted
fields.hint: Provide a summary of the tasks you have completed during the week.

fields.label: Milestones reached
fields.name: milestonesReached
fields.hint: Highlight any significant milestones or achievements you have reached.

fields.label: Challenges encountered
fields.name: challengesEncountered
fields.hint: Describe any challenges or obstacles you encountered during the week.

fields.label: Approach and solutions
fields.name: approachSolutions
fields.hint: Explain the approach you took to address the challenges and any solutions or workarounds you implemented.

fields.label: Problem-solving skills
fields.name: problemSolvingSkills
fields.hint: Emphasize how your problem-solving skills helped overcome the obstacles.

fields.label: Tasks and goals
fields.name: tasksGoals
fields.hint: Outline the tasks and goals you plan to focus on in the upcoming week.

fields.label: Deadlines or deliverables
fields.name: deadlinesDeliverables
fields.hint: Specify any upcoming deadlines or deliverables.

fields.label: Dependencies or resources required
fields.name: dependenciesResources
fields.hint: Mention any dependencies or resources required for your tasks and goals.

fields.label: Progress of ongoing projects
fields.name: projectProgress
fields.hint: Provide an update on the progress of ongoing projects you are involved in.

fields.label: Key developments or milestones reached
fields.name: keyDevelopments
fields.hint: Mention any key developments, milestones reached, or notable changes in the projects.

fields.label: Impact of contributions
fields.name: impactContributions
fields.hint: Highlight how your contributions are impacting the progress of the projects.

fields.label: Noteworthy updates or improvements
fields.name: noteworthyUpdates
fields.hint: Include any noteworthy updates, improvements, or new skills acquired.

fields.label: Feedback or suggestions
fields.name: feedbackSuggestions
fields.hint: Share any feedback or suggestions for improving your work or the team's performance.

fields.label: Additional points or matters
fields.name: additionalPoints
fields.hint: Use this section to address any additional points or matters that may be relevant.
